#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		int n,c,p=1;
		cin>>n>>c;
		int a[n+1];
		int i;
		for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
		cin>>a[i];
		for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
		{
			if(a[i]<=c)
			{
				c-=a[i];
			}
			else
			{
				p=0;break;
			}
		}
		if(p)
		cout<<"Yes"<<endl;
		else
		cout<<"No"<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
